list.name: EXPOSE
list.description: Every x seconds, the next Lance Stab exposes enemies on hit. Exposed enemies take x% increased damage for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Every x seconds, the next Lance Stab exposes enemies on hit. Exposed enemies take x% increased damage for x seconds.

list.name: SHREDDING
list.description: Dragon Solo now also heals for x when activated.
list.descriptionHtml: Dragon Solo now also heals for x when activated.
